description:
Leaving Misao behind, Kenshin and Saito make their way inside Shishio`s fortress. Following a confrontation with one of his most powerful henchmen, Kenshin is ready to take on Shishio himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Across the Boundary Between Edo and Meiji
Bakumatsu no Toki o Koete! Taijishita Shishio to Kenshin
Edo ve Meiji Arasındaki Sınırın Ötesinde: Kenshin ve Shishio Karşı Karşıya!
Shishio e Kenshin Frente a Frente
การประจันหน้ากับชิชิโอ
幕末の時を超えて! 対峙した志々雄と剣心
